arm_group.description: da Vinci Sp Surgical System - Robotic - assisted single-port surgery

brief_summary.textblock:
To determine the feasibility of representative urologic procedures as measured by the rate
      of conversions

clinical_study.brief_title: Prospective Investigation of Robotic Single-port System

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Prostatectomy:

          -  Patients age 18-75 years

          -  BMI <=35 kg/m2

          -  Confirmed localized adenocarcinoma of the prostate

          -  Suitable for minimally invasive prostate cancer surgery

        Nephrectomy:

          -  Patient age 18-75 years

          -  BMI <=35 kg/m2

          -  Kidney disease amenable to nephrectomy or partial nephrectomy

          -  Suitable for minimally invasive kidney surgery

        Exclusion Criteria:

        Untreated active infection (includes local kidney infection)

          -  Vulnerable population (ex: prisoners, mentally disabled)

          -  Severe concomitant illness that drastically shortens life expectancy or increases
             risk of therapeutic interventions (i.e., cancer)

          -  Anatomy unsuitable for endoscopic visualization or minimally invasive surgery

          -  Patient with second primary cancer

          -  Extensive previous abdominal surgery

          -  Prior radiation treatment for prostate or kidney cancer

          -  Patient with distant metastasis

          -  Complex renal vascular anatomy

          -  Patient with kidney cancer - stage T3 or N+ M+ **

          -  Horseshoe kidney**

          -  Previous ipsilateral kidney surgery **- specific to kidney surgery  -

intervention.intervention_name: da Vinci Sp Surgical System - Robotic

oversight_info.authority: France : Agence française de sécurité sanitaire des produits de santé (French Agency for the Safety of Health Products)

primary_outcome.description: Rate of Conversion to Open approach
primary_outcome.measure: To determine the feasibility as measured by the rate of conversions

secondary_outcome.description: Continence measured by use of pads
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1 year, 2 year and 3 year follow up

secondary_outcome.description: Potency rate administered by International Index of Erectile Function patient questionnaire
